Question
========
One of the assumptions of a regression analysis is about ‘homoscedasticity’. Which graph should we use to check this assumptions? 

Answerlist
----------
* a scatter diagram with the predictors on the X-axis and the dependent variable on the Y-axis
* a scatter diagram with the residuals on the X-axis and dependent variable on the Y-axis
* a scatter diagram with the residuals on the X-axis and the predicted values on the Y-axis 
* a scatter diagram with the predicted values on the X-axis and the residuals on the Y-axis
